members.name: Text()
members.description: Returns a Text node with the parameter as its textual content.

members.name: Text.isElementContentWhitespace
members.description: Returns a Boolean flag indicating whether or not the text node contains only whitespace.

members.name: Text.wholeText
members.description: Returns a DOMString containing the text of all Text nodes logically adjacent to this Node, concatenated in document order.

members.name: Text.assignedSlot
members.description: Returns the HTMLSlotElement object associated with the element.

members.name: Text.replaceWholeText
members.description: Replaces the text of the current node and all logically adjacent nodes with the specified text.

members.name: Text.splitText
members.description: Breaks the node into two nodes at a specified offset.
